name: European Centre for Democracy and Human Rights
goal:
Our main objective is to raise awareness and promote the respect of fundamental human rights in the Gulf region, with a particular focus on Bahrain and Saudi Arabia. To do so, we maintain contacts with EU institutions, media and other relevant stakeholders.
We also collaborate closely with other international NGOs and NGO networks committed to the issues of human rights and democracy in the region.
Besides our Brussels office, we also have an office in Beirut, Lebanon which is focused on independence and neutrality of medical services during armed conflicts and civil unrest through our initiative Defenders for Medical Impartiality (DMI).
interests: Communication, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: European Parliament resolutions and letters, EU Strategic Framework and Action Plan on Human Rights.
